children: . ‘‘Ariyamaggañca

vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi anariyamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo? Micchādiṭṭhi…pe… micchāvimutti – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo? Sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāvimutti – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.

ca, bhikkhave, kaṇhamaggo? Micchādiṭṭhi…pe… micchāvimutti – ayaṃ
vuccati, bhikkhave, kaṇhamaggo. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sukkamaggo? Sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāvimutti – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukkamaggo’’ti. Dutiyaṃ.
